title: Tahiyatul Masjid in Haram, does Tawaf suffice the job? - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: do we have to offer the hiatal Masjid when we enter al Haram and measure that Haram the answer is yes it is a message it like any other Masjid you must not sit down in any message it that is full-fledged Masjid without praying two Rakas so he may ask brother Nia's and says okay but I heard that the Tawaf is that the hey it will miss you and this is not true if you want to offer seven rounds of toe off as voluntary good for you but still before you sit down you have to pray 2 rakats
